SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.ace.lewissketch
Class MolToXML

java.lang.Object
  com.ace.lewissketch.MolToXML
All Implemented Interfaces:
LsConstants
public class MolToXML
extends Object
implements LsConstants

Converts a molecule or a string representing a molecule (MOL or MRV) to MRV format for use by JChem or for display in MarvinView. In the latter case, electrons are rendered as bullet characters in textboxes.

getXML

public static String getXML(String molString)
Returns the molecule in the format of a Marvin XML/CML string. Works for MOL produced by LewisSketch, not necessarily for MOL in general.

Parameters:
molString - a molecule in MOL or MRV format
Returns:
the molecule in MRV format

the molecule in MRV format

getXML

public static String getXML(String molString,
                            int width)
Returns the molecule in the format of a Marvin XML/CML string. Works for MOL produced by LewisSketch, not necessarily for MOL in general.

Parameters:
molString - a molecule in MOL or MRV format
width - if > 0, the width to which to rescale the figure
Returns:
the molecule in MRV format

public static String getXML(String molString,
                            boolean forMView)
Returns the molecule in the format of a Marvin XML/CML string. Works for MOL produced by LewisSketch, not necessarily for MOL in general.

Parameters:
molString - a molecule in MOL or MRV format
forMView - whether this XML is being prepared for MarvinView
Returns:
the molecule in MRV format

getAtomColorSets

private void getAtomColorSets(int[] atomSet)
Sifts the atoms into sets by color. Set 0 is black/default.

Parameters:
atomSet - number of color of each atom in chemData

getBondColorSets

private void getBondColorSets(int[] bondSet)
Sifts the bonds into sets by color. Set 0 is black/default.

Parameters:
bondSet - number of color of each bond in chemData

addColor

private void addColor(int[] itemSet,
                      int itemIndex,
                      List<Color> setColors,
                      Color color)
Determines which color set the item (atom or bond) belongs to. If a set for the given color doesn't exist in setColors, one is added. Assigns itemSet[itemIndex] to the determined color set for this item.

Parameters:
itemSet - list of set numbers for items (atoms or bonds)
itemIndex - which item in itemSet[] is being worked on
setColors - list of colors for color sets (in/out parameter)
color - color of the item being worked on

getLewisToMarvinScale

public static double getLewisToMarvinScale(int width)
Gets the factor that scales Lewis pictures to the MarvinView canvas.

Returns:
the factor that scales Lewis pictures to the MarvinView canvas

xmlMDocumentTag

private StringBuilder xmlMDocumentTag()
Creates and returns the XML <MDocument> tag, which may contain information on color sets for atoms and bonds.

Returns:
the XML <MDocument> tag

makeColorSetAttrib

private StringBuilder makeColorSetAttrib(String itemName,
                                         List<Color> setColors)
Makes a bondSetRGB or atomSetRGB attribute for the <MDocument> XML tag.
Attribute format: atomSetRGB = "0:N,1:#ff0000,2:N,3:#ff0000"
Same format for bondSetRGB.
Add the colors for atoms twice, once for normal font and once for iodine font.

Parameters:
itemName - "bond" or "atom"
setColors - list of colors for each color set (first is black)
Returns:
the attribute string

makeFontSetAttrib

private StringBuilder makeFontSetAttrib()
Makes an atomSetFont attribute for the <MDocument> XML tag.
Attribute format: "0:SansSerif-PLAIN-12,1:Serif-PLAIN-14"
Add normal font for each atom color, then repeat for iodine font.

Returns:
the attribute string

xmlAtomArray

private StringBuilder xmlAtomArray(double scale,
                                   boolean forMView)
Creates the <atomArray> tag with attributes for the atoms.

Parameters:
scale - scale factor for the coordinates (for MarvinView only)
forMView - whether this XML is being prepared for MarvinView
Returns:
the <atomArray> tag with attributes for the atoms

makeMrvSeqAttrib

private StringBuilder makeMrvSeqAttrib()
Makes and returns a mrvSetSeq attribute for the given atoms.
Format Example: mrvSetSeq = "1 3 0 0 0 2 3"
where atomColorSets = {1, 3, 0, 0, 0, 2, 3}

Returns:
mrvSetSeq attribute for the atoms

xmlBondArray

private StringBuilder xmlBondArray()
Creates the <bondArray> </bondArray> tags and tags for bonds.

Returns:
the <bondArray> </bondArray> tags

xmlAtomPeripheries

private StringBuilder xmlAtomPeripheries(double scale)
Creates <MTextBox> entries to place lone electrons and charges

Returns:
the XML for the lone electrons and charges

addCharge

private StringBuilder addCharge(Atom atom,
                                int setNum,
                                double scale)
Adds an atom's charge to the XML picture. Format: 
 <MTextBox>
 <Field name = "text">2- </Field>
 <MPoint x = "-4.608333349227905" y = "2.7999998927116394" />
 <MPoint x = "-4.043666682561238" y = "2.7999998927116625" />
 <MPoint x = "-4.043666682561238" y = "2.081333226044997" />
 <MPoint x = "-4.608333349227909" y = "2.0813332260449737" />
 <MTextBox>

Parameters:
atom - the atom
setNum - the number of the color set
scale - scale factor for the coordinates
Returns:
the XML

addElectrons

private StringBuilder addElectrons(Atom atom,
                                   int setNum,
                                   double scale)
Make a textBox entry for each lone electron. We use • (bullet) for the electron; alternatives are ⋅ (dot operator) or · (middot).

Parameters:
atom - the atom
setNum - the number of the color set
scale - scale factor for the coordinates
Returns:
the XML

makeMPointTag

private String makeMPointTag(double x,
                             double y)
Makes the tag for an MPoint.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate
y - the y-coordinate
Returns:
the MPoint's tag
